title: Pixel 2XL won't turn on
content:
My Pixel 2XL phone won't turn on.

Last night I left it charging just as I do every night. Today, when I woke up the screen was black and it didn't turn back on. I tried connecting it again and it wouldn't charge. I tried using another cable and it wouldn't charge. I tried connecting it to my computer and it couldn't recognize it, plus, it wouldn't charge.

I also tried factory resetting it (Power button + Volume down button) and nothing seems to happen. I keep those buttons pressed for over 60 seconds and nothing will happen.

Can anybody help? thanks
